title: Irish grilled steak sandwich with onion salad
ingredients: ['60 g (2¼ oz) onion, finely sliced', '1 small baguette or 2 long crusty rolls', 'A little low-fat spread, optional', '1 large lettuce leaf, torn', '1 large tomato, sliced', '2 thin steaks of beef, about 100 g (3½ oz) each', 'A little vegetable oil, to brush', 'Salt and black pepper', 'To serve: horseradish or mustard']
